types.text: For words your child understands but does not yet say on his/her own, mark the first column (understands). For words that your child not only understands but also says on his/her own, mark the second column (understands and says). If your child uses a different pronunciation of a word or another word with the same meaning (e.g., nana for grandma), mark it anyway.
types.title: Vocabulary Checklist
